{{ZScriptNote}} '''[[Structs:SecPlane|SecPlane]]'''
native double '''HeightDiff'''(double ''oldd''[, double ''newd'']) const
==Usage== Gets the vertical difference between two given distances for a SecPlane. Useful if a movement amount needs to be clamped given a destination distance.
===Parameters=== *''oldd'' - The previous distance from the world origin. *''newd'' - The destination distance from the world origin. Defaults to 1e37.
===Return Value=== Returns the height difference between the two distances.
==Examples== {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:SecPlane]]
